name: The Parkmore Hotel
description:
Welcome to The Parkmore Hotel, your ideal home away from home nestled in the heart of Parkville, Victoria. Just a 15-minute tram ride from Melbourne’s vibrant city center, our hotel offers a serene retreat with a touch of elegance and comfort.

Our Story

Re-Established in 2023, The Parkmore Hotel has been a beacon of hospitality in Parkville, providing guests with exceptional service and unforgettable experiences. Our commitment to excellence and attention to detail ensure that every stay with us is a memorable one.

Amenities and Services

At The Parkmore Hotel, we strive to cater to all your needs, whether you're here for business or leisure. Our range of amenities includes:

Outdoor Swimming Pool: Dive into relaxation in our outdoor swimming pool, perfect for unwinding after a day of exploring the city.
Fitness Center: Stay active with our state-of-the-art gym facilities.
Sauna: Rejuvenate your senses in our tranquil sauna.
Complimentary Wi-Fi: Stay connected with high-speed internet access throughout the hotel.
Onsite Parking: Convenient and secure parking available for our guests.
Dining

Indulge in a culinary journey at our on-site restaurant, where our talented chefs prepare a variety of dishes using fresh, locally-sourced ingredients. Whether you're in the mood for a hearty breakfast, a light lunch, or a gourmet dinner, our menu offers something for everyone.

Accommodation

Our beautifully designed rooms and suites provide the perfect blend of comfort and luxury. Each room is equipped with modern amenities to ensure a relaxing stay, including plush bedding, flat-screen TVs, and spacious bathrooms.

Explore Parkville

Located in the culturally rich area of Parkville, our hotel is a gateway to some of Melbourne’s most iconic attractions. Discover the historical architecture, visit nearby museums, or take a leisurely stroll through the lush Royal Park.

houseRules.notes:
Security Deposit Policy
 
Upon Check-in, all guests are required to present a valid PHOTO ID and a CREDIT CARD. We reserve the right to make a photocopy of the credit card for compensation purposes in the event of any damages to the room during the stay.

$50 Pre-authorization on your Credit Card / Debit Card,  
CASH NOT ACCEPT
Funds will be return to your card in 5-7 business days after check-out.

·   I agree that I am personally liable to pay for all accommodation, food, beverage, etc, purchased by me, my guest and other occupiers of my room/s.
·   Charges agreed to be paid by any other organization, remain my responsibility if not timely paid.
·   I am responsible to pay for any damages or loss caused to the hotel by me, my guest or other occupiers of my room. I authorize the hotel to charge my credit card with these costs, including for damages discovered after my check-out.
·   If I am not present to sign my credit card at check-out time, I authorize the hotel to charge my credit card and commit to pay all charges.

No Party Policy / No smoking policy Term & Conditions:
I have read & understood the policy, a copy of which is displayed at the hotel reception and on the hotel’s website.
·   I agree that noncompliance with noise restrictions and inappropriate behavior may result in being asked to leave the hotel with no refund.
·   I agree that the number of persons in my room will not exceed the number of persons registered at check-in.
·   I agree that smoking in the room will incur up to $650 fee.
